explains: v. 呜咽，啜泣；啜泣着说；低声抱怨
n. 呜咽声，啜泣声；牢骚，怨声；微弱的声音；虎头蛇尾

sentences.en: If he starts to whimper, I'll just harmonize with him.
sentences.cn: 如果他开始呜咽，我就给他配和声。

sentences.en: Japan's efforts to tackle these problems have resembled a big whimper.
sentences.cn: 日本解决这些难题的努力像是一个很大声的啜泣。

sentences.en: He might appear to have died with a bang, but he had long before died with a whimper.
sentences.cn: 他好像是死于一声枪响，但很早以前，他就已经在一声呜咽中死去了。
